title: 95/31/EC: Commission Decision of 10 February 1995 amending the list of establishments in the Community for which are granted temporary and limited derogations from specific Community health rules on the production and marketing of fresh meat, adopted by Commission Decision 94/14/EC (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 10 February 1995 amending the list of establishments in the Community for which are granted temporary and limited derogations from specific Community health rules on the production and marketing of fresh meat, adopted by  Commission Decision 94/14/EC (Text with EEA relevance) (95/31/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The establishments listed in the Annex are hereby added to the list adopted by Decision 94/14/EC.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 February 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 105.
(2) OJ No 121, 29. 7. 1964, p. 2012/64.
(3) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 69.
(4) OJ No L 14, 17. 1. 1994, p. 1.
ANNEX
List of the Community establishments for which is granted a temporary and limited derogation - Council Directive 91/498/EEC
